body_html:
I don't know if the proposed backward algo is doable with the current implementation. Maybe Yuan can comment.

In the mean time, could you try to break up the long foldl into a few pieces, and perhaps place control dependencies among them?

In the mean time, could you try to break up the long foldl into a few pieces, and perhaps place control dependencies among them?
body:
I don't know if the proposed backward algo is doable with the current implementation.  Maybe Yuan can comment.

In the mean time, could you try to break up the long `foldl` into a few pieces, and perhaps place control dependencies among them?
